span.strong: ALL SCHOOLS IN THE BLOOM-CARROLL LOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICT WILL BE CLOSED, BY ORDER OF THE GOVERNOR OF THE STATE OF OHIO FROM MONDAY, MARCH 16TH THROUGH THE REMAINDER OF THE SCHOOL YEAR. FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE
